body:
Comment 6: 
Re #3, agree about the detection at start-up proposal.

however, we need to make cmd/8g embed the current GO386 setting into the package archive,
instead of relying on cmd/8l to embed that.
i think we also need to make GO386=sse pkg.a incompatible with GO386=387 pkg.a and detect
incompatible mixes that at link time.

this is somewhat big change, is it ok for Go 1.1?
